metadata.title: CVE-2021-30473 on Ubuntu 22.04 ESM (jammy) - medium
metadata.description:
aom_image.c in libaom in AOMedia before 2021-04-07 frees memory that is notlocated on the heap.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-30473` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

aom-tools - 3.3.0-1
libaom3 - 3.3.0-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: aom package in jammy, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.3.0-1').
